title: "Fintech giant Klarna raises $639M at a $45.6B valuation amid ‘massive momentum’ in the US"
excerpt: "Just over three months after its last funding round, European fintech giant Klarna is announcing today that it has raised another $639 million at a staggering post-money valuation of $45.6 billion. Rumors swirled in recent weeks that Klarna had raised more money at a valuation north of $40 billion."
